item.title: Robust Detection of Heart Beats in Multimodal Physiological Data
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: System Biology Research Center (SBRC) at Gwangu Institute of Science and Technology (GIST)

Period: Jan 2014 - Dec 2015

Tasks:

  • Detect heartbeat position when ECG signal is contaminated
  • Design complementary model with the other physiological signals (EEG, EMG, EOG, Blood Pressure, Respiration, and Stroke Volume)

Related Knowledge:

Physiological Signal Processing, Wavelet Analysis, Electrocardiogram (ECG), Blood Pressure (BP), Electroencephalogram (EEG)

Skills:

C, MATLAB, WFDB (WaveForm DataBase) Software Package

Report

Descriptions

Description and contributions

In this project, I have designed and implemented an algorithm for robust heartbeat detection using a multimodal data association method supplementing ECG (being regarded as a primary input signal) with blood pressure (BP) and electroencephalogram (EEG) viewed as complementary inputs.

Screenshots
